recipe.title: Blue Cheese, Port, and Walnut Spread
ingredients: 1 pound blue cheese (such as Stilton or Gorgonzola), crumbled
instructions: In a food processor blend together the cheese, the butter, and the Port until the mixture is smooth and in a bowl combine well the cheese mixture and the walnuts. Transfer the spread to crocks or ramekins. The spread keeps, covered and chilled, for 3 weeks. Serve the spread with crackers.
